main.name: Urjit Desai
main.occupation: I am a Software Engineer interested in using modern technology to make our lives easier. Love facing new challenges and solving new problems. I believe a Software Engineer is a student for life and so am I. There is certainly yet more to learn, yet more problems to solve, yet more to build. And, I look forward to it.
main.description: Currently looking for Summer 2022 SWE Internships
main.bio: Hi, looks like I seem to be of interest to you! I am a Software Developer with background in Web Development and Machine Learning. My inclination towards using modern technology to solve the challenging real world problems has led to me to pursue my master's in computer science.    My first professional project stemmed out of the need to process structured and unstructured invoices. I was given the opportunity to develop a platform which allows users to annotate and process invoices, build Machine Learning models based on these invoices, test the models on new data and provide facility for error correction. Seeing my work save 75% of the time required otherwise has further motivated me to use my skills to solve real problems. Said that, I am looking for summer 2022 internship opportunities in companies that share my passion.    There is certainly yet more to learn, yet more problems to solve, yet more to build. And, I look forward to it.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: CSCI 570: Analysis of Algorithms, CSCI 585: Database Systems

education.school: Mumbai University, St. Francis Institute of Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
education.description2: Courses: Algorithms, Data Structures, Machine Learning, Database Management Systems, Object Oriented Programming (OOP), Software Engineering, Web Technologies, Operating Systems, Artificial Intelligence, Distributed Systems, Computer Networks

work.title: Software Engineer
work.tech: JavaScript, Python, React, Node, Express, Flask, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, AWS(S3, EC2, Lambdas, DynamoDB, Cognito, Sagemaker)
work.description:
Developed a platform with the following modules:1. An invoice processing module that allows users to upload and annotate documents for key-value pairs using React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Material UI.
 2. A training pipeline which allows users to highlight the details in documents which serve as feature vectors for using the documents to train a Machine Learning Model.
 3. A module which allows users to build, monitor and manage ML models and all its details such as: epochs, hyperparameters, training & testing status, ETA. 
 4. A testing module which allows users to test new documents on the existing ML models along with implementing human in the loop feature for error correction and model optimization.
Developed backend modules in Node.js and Flask and integrated it with the front-end and AWS.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.tech: JavaScript, Python, React, Node, Express, Flask, MongoDB, HTML, CSS
work.description: Collaborated with a team of 4 members to build a platform to automate the process of data wrangling, exploratory data analysis, building predictive models, testing and analyzing the results of these models. Provided suggestions on the UI regarding which ML models to use by analyzing the quality and quantity of the dataset. The platform reduced the time taken by the entire process by 70%; moreover, allowing people with a non-technical background to build and analyze data and models quickly and efficiently.

work.title: Android Developer Intern
work.tech: Android Studio, Google Maps API, Java, MySQL
work.description: Worked in a team of 3 to develop a module in a parking app which allows users to locate, reserve and pay for parking spots.

projects.title: Proshop
projects.category: A full stack e-commerce web application built using React, Node, Redux, MongoDB, Express, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

projects.title: Thoughts
projects.category: A full stack social media web application similar to Twitter

projects.title: Driver Drowsiness Detection
projects.category: Used ML to prdict the state of the driver and raise an alarm if found to be drowsy/distracted.

projects.title: Road sign classification
projects.category: Used CNN to classify german road signs.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
